author: Game Yetu
title: The Standard - Kenya: Arsenal’s Hector Bellerin could face Hull on Saturday | The Standard - Kenya : GameYetu
text:
[PHOTO: COURTESY] 
Arsenal’s Hector Bellerin could face Hull City on Saturday, as per the Sun. 
Bellerin who was knocked out at Chelsea, has been given the all-clear after an MRI scan. 
The Arsenal right-back was left dazed after being caught by Marcos Alonso's elbow as the Chelsea left-back climbed to open the scoring. 
He was immediately substituted because of the injury. 
But he has now revealed he is recovering well. 
The defender will now join in with training tomorrow. FA guidelines suggest concussed players should not play for 14 days but club doctors have the final say.
